name: 玛利亚·特雷萨·托法诺
name_full: 玛利亚·特雷萨·托法诺 Maria Teresa Tofano
introduction: Maria Teresa Tofano debuted in the Italian horror classic La notte che Evelyn uscì dalla tomba, better known to English-speakers as The Night Evelyn Came Out of the Grave (1971). It’s the classic tale of wealthy pervert lures beautiful young women to his castle so he can have their way with them. One of them is Maria, who plays Polly, and you’ll want to crack her. You’ll come out of your pants when she goes topless, and she’s got so much top it’s more like she’s top-more.
